description: Gets the resource associated with the application.

parameters.name: application
parameters.description: The name, ID, or ARN of the application.

parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description: The type of resource associated with the application.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: The name or ID of the resource associated with the application.

parameters.name: resourceTagStatus
parameters.description: States whether an application tag is applied, not applied, in the process of being applied, or skipped. (string) ---

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the resource.

nested_items.name: associationTime
nested_items.description: The time the resource was associated with the application.

nested_items.name: integrations
nested_items.description: The service integration information about the resource.

nested_items.name: resourceGroup
nested_items.description: The information about the integration of Resource Groups.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the propagation process for the resource group. The states includes:

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the resource group.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message that generates when the propagation process for the resource group fails.

nested_items.name: options
nested_items.description: Determines whether an application tag is applied or skipped.

nested_items.name: applicationTagResult
nested_items.description: The result of the application that's tag applied to a resource.

nested_items.name: applicationTagStatus
nested_items.description: The application tag is in the process of being applied to a resource, was successfully applied to a resource, or failed to apply to a resource.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The message returned if the call fails.

nested_items.name: resources
nested_items.description: The resources associated with an application.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the resource.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The message returned if the call fails.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the list item.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: Provides information about the AppRegistry resource type.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A unique pagination token for each page of results. Make the call again with the returned token to retrieve the next page of results.
